page.title: Host Marriott Quarterly Loss Narrows
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - Hotel owner Host Marriott Corp. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=HMT.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">HMT.N</A> on Wednesday said its third-quarter loss narrowed as revenue per room rose, driven by an increase in room rates.
